Posts.Content: I seem to be having alot of pain in my chest and down my arm and wrist. Its seems to go down on the in part of the arm when I reach for anything, and tightness in my chest which feels like something squeeing me to tight. Specially when I get up in the morning. Has any one eles experienced this type of pain and how long does it last I am 6 weeks out from my second surgery for the mastsectomy.
Posts.Title: Pain in arm/wrist after mastsectomy
